32 namespace Ogre {
33 namespace RTShader {
34 
42 // Fixed Function vertex shader stages.
43 enum FFPVertexShaderStage
44 {
45  FFP_VS_PRE_PROCESS = 0,
46  FFP_VS_TRANSFORM = 100,
47  FFP_VS_COLOUR = 200,
48  FFP_VS_LIGHTING = 300,
49  FFP_VS_TEXTURING = 400,
50  FFP_VS_FOG = 500,
51  FFP_VS_POST_PROCESS = 2000
52 };
53 
54 // Fixed Function fragment shader stages.
55 enum FFPFragmentShaderStage
56 {
57  FFP_PS_PRE_PROCESS = 0,
58  FFP_PS_COLOUR_BEGIN = 100,
59  FFP_PS_SAMPLING = 150,
60  FFP_PS_TEXTURING = 200,
61  FFP_PS_COLOUR_END = 300,
62  FFP_PS_FOG = 400,
63  FFP_PS_POST_PROCESS = 500
64 };
65 
66 // Fixed Function generic stages.
67 enum FFPShaderStage
68 {
69  FFP_PRE_PROCESS = 0,
70  FFP_TRANSFORM = 100,
71  FFP_COLOUR = 200,
72  FFP_LIGHTING = 300,
73  FFP_TEXTURING = 400,
74  FFP_FOG = 500,
75  FFP_POST_PROCESS = 600
76 };
